title: Lowgrade, but attractive and affordable t206 Walter Johnson (portrait) - SOLD
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Lowgrade, but attractive and affordable t206 Walter Johnson (portrait) - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian McQueen

CARD IS NOW SOLD....THANKS GUYS!

Very popular t206 with a strong image of Johnson.  It's in a 10 holder due to a couple wrinkles on the front and a bit of discoloration on the surface however this is still a really nice looking card.  The back is clean but does have a couple small scrapes.  Asking $285 or would consider trades for w590s or 1915-1920 and 1932 Zeenuts.  Thanks in advance,

Brian
redmaccie@hotmail.com

PS...the t205 Clarke in the scan is available as well if anyone is interested.
